name: VOnboard
longDescription:
*Improve your learning experience with a user-friendly and intuitive interface*.
Streamline and optimize your trainings on a single platform. Access courses, track progress and performance, assign learning materials anywhere and anytime on VOnboard. It can quickly and efficiently create, manage, administer and deliver effective learning experiences. This LMS will help improve engagement, increase productivity and reduce training costs. Enhance skills, widen the knowledgebase to be efficient and effective at whatever you do. 
*Easily assign and share content*
- Allow users to not only view assigned trainings, but also share recommendations with colleagues on Microsoft Teams.
- Provide structured learning paths for users to explore concepts in-depth.
*Receive real-time notifications*
- Stay up-to-date with Chat notifications associated with you in Microsoft Teams.
- Set the frequency for the reminders and let the system send the reminders if there is a timeline set for the training completion.
*Get detailed viewing reports*
- Admins can view detailed reports on the number of attempts, time spent by each learner on each visit.
- View each learner's scores for each attempt.
- Stay informed about the number of users created on the LMS with people reports.
- Save filters and set reminders to roll out the reports on time.
*Integrate with a content library*
- Integrate with any course content library to provide training to the learner with one click.
*Experience seamless training*
- Users can complete their training without interruptions anytime, anywhere using VOnboard within the Microsoft Teams application.
*Get Started with VOnboard on Microsoft Teams*
- To get started, search for VOnboard in the Teams application store and add it to your dashboard.
- If you have an organisation ID, enter it when prompted. If you don't have an organisation ID, don't worry! You can still use VOnboard by entering 'demo.vonboard.io' instead. Our support team will then get in touch with you to provide further assistance.
- Once you're in, explore the features and start learning! For more information, check out our website [www.violetinfo.com/vonboard](https://www.violetinfo.com/vonboard/) or [contact us](https://www.violetinfo.com/contact-us/) to [book a demo](https://www.violetinfo.com/contact-us/).
shortDescription: VOnboard is a comprehensive solution addressing the users learning needs.
